title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
AVAPOW Car Jump Starter – 12V Auto Jump Box

This is a portable jump starter for vehicle battery. Peak current is 4000A. Battery capacity is 27,800 mAh (88 Wh). It can start gasoline engines of all sizes and diesel engines up to 10L. On full charge it can try to start around 40 times, depending on vehicle condition and temperature.

Main functions:
- Jump start 12V vehicles: cars, motorcycles, ATV, UTV, lawn mowers, snowmobiles.
- USB power bank: one USB quick charge 3.0 port (5V/3A, 9V/2A, 12V/1.5A) and one USB 5V/2.4A port.
- Type-C port supports input and output.
- Built-in LED light with flashlight, SOS, and strobe modes.

Protection and design:
- Intelligent protection systems: short circuit, low battery, high temperature, reverse connection.
- Rugged design with metal clamps.
- Portable carry case for storage.

Charging:
- Type-C charging for the unit. Adapter is not included.
- Charging speed for devices can be up to 75% faster than ordinary power banks, using QC 3.0 port.

Package includes:
- Portable Battery Starter
- Jumper Cables
- USB-C Cable
- Cigarette Lighter Converter
- Carry Case
- User Manual

After-sales:
- 24-hour online after-sales team for support.

Notes:
- This is for 12V systems only.
- Please check the polarity before connecting. Red to positive (+), black to negative (−).
- Do not use in extremely high temperature for long time. Let the unit cool if it becomes hot.
- Please charge the jump starter after use or every 3 months if not used, to keep battery health.
